mv X Z
-- m.go --
package m

var X int
-- m_test.go --
package m

var Y = X
-- mx_test.go --
package m_test

import "m"

var Z = m.X + m.Y
-- q/q.go --
package q

import "m"

var W = m.X
-- stdout --
diff old/m.go new/m.go
--- old/m.go
+++ new/m.go
@@ -1,3 +1,3 @@
 package m

-var X int
+var Z int
diff old/m_test.go new/m_test.go
--- old/m_test.go
+++ new/m_test.go
@@ -1,3 +1,3 @@
 package m

-var Y = X
+var Y = Z
diff old/mx_test.go new/mx_test.go
--- old/mx_test.go
+++ new/mx_test.go
@@ -2,4 +2,4 @@

 import "m"

-var Z = m.X + m.Y
+var Z = m.Z + m.Y
diff old/q/q.go new/q/q.go
--- old/q/q.go
+++ new/q/q.go
@@ -2,4 +2,4 @@

 import "m"

-var W = m.X
+var W = m.Z
